content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --PTCD
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: --DECOD
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0049
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --DECOD and --PTCD do not have a one-to-one relationship
Outcome:
  Message: --DECOD and --PTCD do not have a one-to-one relationship
  Output Variables:
    - --PTCD
    - --DECOD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Domain
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0049
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Standardized or dictionary-derived text for the description
                  of an event or intervention. Equivalent to the Preferred Term (PT
                  in MedDRA).
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DECOD
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: The preferred term code assigned to the event from
                  MedDRA.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --PTCD
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --DECOD and --PTCD do not have a one-to-one relationship

Outcome.Message: --DECOD and --PTCD do not have a one-to-one relationship

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Standardized or dictionary-derived text for the description of an event or intervention. Equivalent to the Preferred Term (PT in MedDRA).
The preferred term code assigned to the event from MedDRA.
